archimate:Requirement.name: PA.1.2.16g: g) enables the web browser's privacy mode (or equivalent) to stop the browser storing authentication information, such as passwords/passphrases or tracking information.
archimate:Requirement.documentation: This is a standard topic modelled from the 2022 Version of the Standards Of Good Practice by ISF. It has been adopted as version 3 of the Security Baseline.
